channel.title: A MoparScape Project
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
For awhile now I've wanted to start something interesting on MoparScape. I reviewed a past project called [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265703.0.html]Project Notebook[/url] and it seemed really interesting.
I'd like to start something similar to this that would involve the common members of MoparScape having to participate and contribute to this. I think it would be interesting to see the outcome of what we come up with.
To begin the project, we need to know [b]who will participate. [/b] If you are interested in doing this, post below. At this stage, I will accept anyone. However, you may be kicked out later if there are trust issues. In the future a few selected leaders may be selected to keep things flowing smoothly.
[b][u]Current Project Members[/u][/b]
1. Chassy13 2. the wanderer 3. Davidi2 4. n10si t 5. krackkid 6. LilXCj 7. Liquid Magic 8. Cole1497 9 Andrew Ferguson 10. m.dog311 11. k0 twin 12. IlikeArrays 13. ranger squad 14. Newty 15. Saphire' 16. gravenfire23 17. reyx7 18. shrogg 19. Wintercanon 20. Jc22493 21. I Vain I 22. Rash 23. Muroth 24. casey. 25. xxxxxx 13 26. Stupit
Secondly,[b] we need ideas.[/b]
What should we do for the project? Should we begin a MoparScape project notebook, or should we begin a different one? If you have any ideas, post them! I'm open to any suggestions. I was thinking something similar to Project Notebook.
This thread won't contain much information until I find out who is willing to participate and with what we will do this project with.
[b][size=14pt]F.A.Q.[/size][/b]
Q: [b]What do we have to do?[/b] A: It depends on the project. If we do Project Notebook, it would contain sending a notebook to someone else. You would write something in the notebook, and it would go through the chain of members and finally return back to the original sender who would post all of the results.
Q: [b]Will it cost anything?[/b] A: If we involve shipping a notebook to another place, probably. The shipping cost can be calculated, and if needed, we can help fund each other. I'd be willing to send a few dollars in the mail for the next person, but only to people that are trusted. The only costs would be shipping.
Q: [b]What if I don't want to release my address?[/b] A: The address can be sent privately to the previous person sending it to you. Any untrusted people will be most likely kicked from the project, but your address will NOT be released. If you are that concerned, use an address that is not personal.
Q: [b]How long until this project starts?[/b] A: The project will not start until we have enough members and ideas. A new thread will be made when the project is about to start that will contain information along with a starting date.
Q: [b]What if someone doesn't play their role?[/b] A: Nothing we can do about that. This whole thing will be based upon trust. You will be expected to tell people important information along with playing your role and contributing.
If you have any other questions, ask. Otherwise get some ideas and feedback flowing in here.

item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I have the notebook and have opened up the other thread. I have already requested for this thread to be locked.

Feel free to post any suggestions and to read the WHOLE thread.

Read full topic

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

krackkid:

can I make sure I send to casey? since we are both in Florida?

I will take note of that. The first things going on in the new thread will be:

  1. The voting on who will be left in/kicked from the project.
  2. Find out what state everyone is in.
  3. Create a list that would be the most convenient for shipping.

Read full topic

item.title: A MoparScape Project
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

xxxxxx 13:

I don’t know if i was accepted or not…possible over looked? lol. Anyways, has there even been a choice as to for sure whats being put in the notebook. Is it a message, a drawing, a story, and what are we including…a timestamp or what? I think whats going in the Notebook and whats being included should be decided upon to clear up alot of confusion.

You are #26 on the list.

Everyone will have 1-2 pages to themselves in the notebook where they can put whatever. It’s up to you what you write on those pages.

I’m going to try and pick up the notebook on my way to town this afternoon, and then I will begin pre-writing the new thread.

Read full topic

item.title: A MoparScape Project
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

TabbyKiller:

I reckon it should be a prize later on when theres a moparscape competition. And MITB has to sign it!

If he posts and wants to participate in this that is.

SETO:

i don’t remeber correctly, but at moparisthebest, i think someone kept the notebook or it somehow got lost, all the hard work down the drain

Pretty sure that it was just laziness and didn’t get sent.

So what happens to the notebook at the end?

I don’t even want to think about that right now. The first step is completing the notebook. It will circulate everyone and then finally come back to me, in which I will post the results. We will then decide what happens to it next. It will probably either be sent to Moparisthebest or given away in a contest.

suber man:

i will be an part of it.

Sorry but I have never seen you on these forums. Not trying to be rude, but I am going to save you the trouble and just leave you out of the project. If you stay active and get involved in the community, you could probably make it in another project like this if one is made.

Read full topic

Anyways 3-5 days for boarder states. (I used to play chess via postal.)
